setting_music_desc: Configure your preferred music streaming service. Only one source can be connected at a time
setting_ai_desc: Configure your preferred ai service. Only one source can be connected at a time
qr_desc: Scan this QR code with your mobile device to sign in instantly
login_desc: Log in to your account to continue
create_desc: Enter your details to create an account
submit_create_desc: Already have an account? Log in
ai_apikey_desc: Enter the apikey of the ai manufacturer you registered
